mapper.insert: insert into orders (pack_amount,tableware_number,tableware_status,address,consignee,estimated_delivery_time,delivery_status, number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time,pay_method, pay_status, amount, remark,checkout_time,phone) values (#{packAmount},#{tablewareNumber},#{tablewareStatus},#{address},#{consignee},#{estimatedDeliveryTime},#{deliveryStatus}, #{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime},#{payMethod}, #{payStatus},#{amount},#{remark},#{checkoutTime},#{phone})
